identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Swiss Industrial' design system that merges brutalist efficiency with modern SaaS usability. No generic templates.
principles: Fusion: Braun Electronics x Swiss Typography
Content: Data is the art. Tables and numbers must look beautiful.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in factory environments.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

strategies.dashboard: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density). Use grid-cols-4. Summary cards col-span-1. Main chart col-span-3.
strategies.tables: Minimalist. No vertical borders. Header: uppercase, text-xs, font-bold, text-muted-foreground. Rows: h-12, hover:bg-muted/50.
strategies.forms: Split screen. Left: Input fields (stacked). Right: Live Preview of the PO (sticky).

components.buttons: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). Primary: Solid Blue. Secondary: Outline Grey.
components.cards: Flat, 1px border (border-border), no shadow (shadow-none) or very subtle (shadow-sm).
components.navigation: Sidebar navigation. Dark sidebar in light mode for contrast (optional) or clean white with active state border-l-4 border-primary.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the sidebar or auth page background.
visual_enhancers.motion: Micro-interactions only. Button press scale (0.98). Table row hover fade.
visual_enhancers.empty_states: Use industrial icons (box, clipboard) in a muted color with a dashed border circle.

auth_background.description: Minimalist industrial factory interior with light streaming in. Perfect for login page side panel.

dashboard_empty.description: Empty warehouse space. Use for 'No Orders' state.

product_placeholder.description: Boxes on shelves. Generic product placeholder.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to the top of /app/frontend/src/index.css.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new font families (Manrope, IBM Plex Sans, JetBrains Mono).
3. APPLY THEME: Replace the CSS variables in /app/frontend/src/index.css with the 'Swiss Industrial' palette provided above.
4. COMPONENT STYLE: When using Shadcn components, ensure 'rounded-md' is replaced with 'rounded-sm' or 'rounded-none' to match the industrial aesthetic.
5. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard. Do not use simple rows.
6. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
